map

Class PathLineSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • map.PathLineSegment

  • public class PathLineSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    This data-class represents a Line segment in a Path's PathElements. It can be either a LineTo, HLineTo or VLineTo. It has been created in order to ease the Label's positioning methods in a Path (see MapStreet class).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PathLineSegment() 
      PathLineSegment(int index, java.lang.Class<? extends javafx.scene.shape.PathElement> classOfPathElement, javafx.geometry.Point2D start, javafx.geometry.Point2D end, javafx.geometry.Point2D middle, double length, double rotationInDegrees)
      Creates a new PathLineSegment containing the coordinates (start, end, middle, lenght, rotation) calculated from a LineTo, HLineTo, VLineTo inside a Path.

        Creates a new PathLineSegment containing the coordinates (start, end, middle, lenght, rotation) calculated from a LineTo, HLineTo, VLineTo inside a Path.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the PathElement
        classOfPathElement - Class of the PathElement
        start - start of the PathElement
        end - end of the PathElement
        middle - middle of the PathElement
        length - length of the PathElement
        rotationInDegrees - Rotation in Degrees of the PathElement
